b = 10

c = a * b
print("Line 3 - Value of c is ", c )
c = a / b
print("Line 4 - Value of c is ", c )

c = a % b
print("Line 5 - Value of c is ", c)

source.8dc3f271:
x = str("s1") # x will be 's1'
print(x)

y = str(2)    # y will be '2'
print(y)

z = str(3.0)  # z will be '3.0
print(z)
